title: Pet Friendly 3 BR Active Senior Apartment Home – Call Now
posting_body: ['At our community, our residents enjoy the comforts of maintenance-free living along with the convenience of an outstanding location.', 'Our one, two and three bedroom apartment homes have unbeatable amenities with in-home washers and dryers, granite countertops, spacious 9-foot ceilings, and a private balcony or patio.', 'With our convenient location close to parks, shopping, restaurants, and many more, just outside your doorstep, there is no better place than The Legends to call your new home!', 'Hurry and reserve your new home today!', 'Community Amenities Include:', '- Beautifully Landscaped Outdoor Patio Seating Area', '- Open & Spacious Floor Plans', '- Smoke-Free Living Environment', '- 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance Service', '- Separate Dining & Living Room Areas', '- Pet-Friendly Community', '- Planned Resident Events', '- Large Walk-In Closet(s)', 'We are a pet friendly community!', 'Dogs & cats welcome!', '*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.', 'Our community is a 55 or better senior community and participates in an affordable housing program.', 'Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $49,320 | 2', 'Occupants: $56,340 | 3', 'Occupants: $63,360 | 4 Occupants: $70,380 | 5 Occupants: $76,020 | 6', 'Occupants: $81,660.', 'To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Call today to learn more about our community:', 'show contact info', '<URL>', '*Some Restrictions May Apply.', 'ivH3J2f3d']
